data.card_desc: Get all five of your five-a-day with this ratatouille & cheese bake that is healthy and filling as well as being gluten-free and vegetarian

data.card_title: Kolhapuri spit chicken (kala masala roast chicken)
data.card_desc: This indian spiced roast chicken makes a great alternative to a traditional Sunday roast. Try with black pepper and garlic sweet potato wedges
A classic kedgeree designed to fill you with warmth and spice. This gluten-free family meal is an easy midweek fix
These rich, fudgy chocolate brownies are gluten free. Serve with a scoop of vanilla ice cream for dessert, or leave to cool before storing in an airtight container for an afternoon treat
John Torode's simple hummus can be blitzed and ready for dipping in 12 minutes. It's vegan, gluten-free and essential to any meze or veggie feast
An easy, no-cook cheesecake that's dairy-free and gluten-free with just a little agave syrup to sweeten. This lusciously lemony vegan dessert will go down wonderfully
Use specialist flour in these quick and easy crepes and safely cater for those on a gluten-free diet
A light, but luscious cake made with hazelnuts - serve a slice for dessert with a dollop of crème fraîche
Everyone loves an easy traybake, this chicken dish with spicy harissa paste is roasted to perfection with garlic, potatoes and cherry tomatoes
A straightforward loaf of bread for anyone who's following a gluten-free diet. Bake this and use it to make sandwiches or toast, or simply slather it in butter
Cater for guests intolerant to gluten with these easy scones. Add sultanas if you like and serve with oodles of jam and clotted cream
Fire up the barbecue and bring out the flavour of these Middle Eastern-style lamb meatballs. They're spiced with harissa, mint, coriander and ras el hanout

This recipe is laden with tasty goodness, it's low fat, low calorie, rich in folate, fibre, vitamin C and iron, plus it's a delicious meat-free main course that's 3 of your 5-a-day - what's not to love?

data.card_title: Balsamic shallots & carrots with goat's cheese
data.card_desc: Sweet shallots and tangy balsamic vinegar make a perfect pairing in this delectable side dish. Crumble over a handful of soft goat's cheese and parsley to serve
This one-tray, vibrant and veg-heavy roast chicken dish provides four of your five-a-day
Our twist on a Sri Lankan staple. Lightly-spiced, succulent chicken makes the perfect partner to hoppers - rice pancakes - served with a silky smooth coconut onion gravy

data.card_title: Ginger cookie sandwiches with lemon mascarpone
data.card_desc: Sandwich ginger biscuits with a creamy, zesty filling to make these gluten-free teatime treats that are aromatic with wintry spices - cloves, nutmeg and cardamom
A stunning homemade pink sorbet with vibrant and sweet forced rhubarb, add a cheeky nip of vodka to make this a little more grown up
The perfect vehicle for gravy and roasted goodies: the Yorkshire pudding - this version is gluten-free but never fear, you still get that characteristic puff and golden colour
Enjoy this nutrient-packed salad, with juicy tomatoes and cucumber, as a delicious and healthy lunch
Pile whipped cream and charred pineapple on a meringue base to create a stunning dinner party dessert which you can make ahead

data.card_title: Butternut soup with crispy sage & apple croutons
data.card_desc: The apple and sage contrast beautifully with naturally sweet butternut squash in this low-fat, gluten-free festive dinner party starter

data.card_title: Baked sea bass with lemon caper dressing
data.card_desc: This elegant, gluten-free main is special enough for a dinner party, yet simple and quick to make for no fuss entertaining
This rich, gluten-free torte has an irresistible chocolate & spice mix. An easy weekend treat or dinner party dessert you can make in advance
